parameters.name: UseDefaultRadius
parameters.description: True to use default bend radius, false to use GlobalRadius

parameters.name: GlobalRadius
parameters.description: Global bend radius

parameters.name: RipGap
parameters.description: Rip-gap distance

parameters.name: UseDefaultRelief
parameters.description: True to use parent bend's ratio, false to not

parameters.name: UseReliefRatio
parameters.description: True to use custom relief ratio, false to not

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: If useReliefRatio is True, then specify relief ratio

parameters.name: ReliefWidth
parameters.description: If UseReliefRatio is True and ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefRectangular or swSheetMetalReliefObround, then specify relief depth

parameters.name: ReliefDepth
parameters.description: If UseReliefRatio is True and ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefRectangular or swSheetMetalReliefObround, then specify relief depth

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Relief type as defined by swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e ; valid selections: swSheetMetalRelievObround swSheetMetalReliefRectangular swSheetMetalReliefTear

parameters.name: TrimSideBends
parameters.description: True to trim side bends, false to not

parameters.name: FlangePos
parameters.description: Flange position as defined by swFlangePositionTypes_e ; valid selections: swFlangePositionTypeMaterialInside swFlangePositionTypeMaterialOutside swFlangePositionTypeBendOutside

parameters.name: OffsetDist1
parameters.description: Starting offset distance if partial flange

parameters.name: OffsetDist2
parameters.description: Ending offset distance if partial flange

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used

title: IFeatureManager.InsertSheetMetalMiterFlange
description: Inserts a meter flange in a sheet metal part.
signature:
Feature InsertSheetMetalMiterFlange( 
   System.Boolean
UseDefaultRadius
,
   System.Double
GlobalRadius
,
   System.Double
RipGap
,
   System.Boolean
UseDefaultRelief
,
   System.Boolean
UseReliefRatio
,
   System.Double
ReliefRatio
,
   System.Double
ReliefWidth
,
   System.Double
ReliefDepth
,
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   System.Boolean
TrimSideBends
,
   System.Int32
FlangePos
,
   System.Double
OffsetDist1
,
   System.Double
OffsetDist2
,
   CustomBendAllowance
PCBA
)

parameters.name: UseDefaultRadius
parameters.description: True to use default bend radius, false to use GlobalRadius

parameters.name: GlobalRadius
parameters.description: Global bend radius

parameters.name: RipGap
parameters.description: Rip-gap distance

parameters.name: UseDefaultRelief
parameters.description: True to use parent bend's ratio, false to not

parameters.name: UseReliefRatio
parameters.description: True to use custom relief ratio, false to not

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: If useReliefRatio is True, then specify relief ratio

parameters.name: ReliefWidth
parameters.description: If UseReliefRatio is True and ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefRectangular or swSheetMetalReliefObround, then specify relief depth

parameters.name: ReliefDepth
parameters.description: If UseReliefRatio is True and ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefRectangular or swSheetMetalReliefObround, then specify relief depth

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Relief type as defined by swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e ; valid selections: swSheetMetalRelievObround swSheetMetalReliefRectangular swSheetMetalReliefTear

parameters.name: TrimSideBends
parameters.description: True to trim side bends, false to not

parameters.name: FlangePos
parameters.description: Flange position as defined by swFlangePositionTypes_e ; valid selections: swFlangePositionTypeMaterialInside swFlangePositionTypeMaterialOutside swFlangePositionTypeBendOutside

parameters.name: OffsetDist1
parameters.description: Starting offset distance if partial flange

parameters.name: OffsetDist2
parameters.description: Ending offset distance if partial flange

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used

returns: Pointer to the IFeature object or NULL
